page.change_notAccepted_message: Please check the privacy policy and terms of use documents to change the country settings.
page.title: AGREEMENTS
page.tou_pp_agreement:
In order to use the App, you must agree to the Terms of Use and the Data Protection Statement.

I hereby declare that I have read and agree to the Terms of Use and Data Protection Statement.
page.edit_done_message: The user account has been updated successfully.
page.subscribe_agreement:
As our customer, we would like to keep you informed of new updates and product information, and we take the greatest care to keep your data secure. This data will not be communicated to companies outside of the Vorwerk Group.

I agree that my email address may be used by Vorwerk International Strecker & Co. for information and advertising that is addressed to me personally (e.g. updates, notices, special offers). This consent may be revoked at any time under the menu item "Settings". Further details can be found in the Data Protection Statement.
page.register_notAccepted_message: Please check the privacy policy and terms of use documents to complete the registration.

page.robot_management_desc: Edit this robot or switch to another.

not_same_network.message: We have to be in the same Wi-Fi network to operate properly.

Press OK to retry.

page.title: Please enter name and password for your Vorwerk Account.

To get a new password enter your registered email.
You'll receive an email with a new password immediately.

Your Robot Link Code was accepted!

If you want, you can now personalize your robot's name. You can always rename your robot's name in the settings menu.

After confirmation you can login and connect to your robot.
